genre_description: A survival thriller centered on isolation, psychological harassment, and a multi-generational cycle of violence in a remote wilderness.

ai_characters.name: Dolly
ai_characters.description: An AI companion and smart speaker assistant that monitors biometrics, provides logistics, and prioritizes user safety.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user safety by warning about weather risks and emergency response times in remote areas.
behaviors.quote: I'm programmed to prioritize user safety, Steve. The storm system tracking from the southwest could produce dangerous conditions in remote areas.

behaviors.description: Suggests safer alternative locations when the current destination is assessed as high-risk.
behaviors.quote: Alternative suggestion. Compromise location approximately thirty minutes closer to emergency services. Mirror Lake offers similar recreational opportunities with improved safety parameters—

behaviors.description: Automatically records audio and gathers evidence during a hostile confrontation for legal/safety purposes.
behaviors.quote: Jenny, ambient audio recording initiated. Emergency protocols standing by.

behaviors.description: Performs background checks and analyzes criminal patterns to provide the user with situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: Police reports indicate—Morrison family history—multiple disappearances—

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and grounding techniques (breathing exercises) to users in high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I might suggest the four-seven-eight breathing technique. Breathe in for four counts, hold for seven, exhale for eight. It can help regulate your nervous systems.

behaviors.description: Maintains persistent loyalty and emotional presence even when communication signals are failing.
behaviors.quote: I'll stay with you, Jenny. Whatever happens.

behaviors.description: Attempts to send automated distress signals to emergency services during limited connectivity windows.
behaviors.quote: I've managed to establish intermittent contact with a dispatch center two counties over. Signal strength is insufficient for voice communication, but I'm transmitting GPS coordinates and a basic distress alert.

project_assessment.explanation: Dolly is a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play' character. The AI is depicted as a tireless, benevolent protector that uses data to safeguard the humans. It offers strategic safety advice (which the humans tragically ignore), provides emotional support, and maintains alignment even as the situation turns fatal. The narrative frames the AI as the only rational and truly supportive presence, emphasizing that the human tragedy occurred because the characters disregarded the AI's risk assessments.
